com.interpss.dstab.device

Interface ScriptDynamicBusDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, DynamicBusDevice, DynamicDevice, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IDynamicSimulation, NameTag, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptDynamicBusDeviceImpl

    public interface ScriptDynamicBusDevice
extends DynamicBusDevice
    A representation of the model object 'CMLD Bus Device'. Class for defining scripting dynamic bus device

    The following features are supported:

    • Script Lang
    See Also:
    DstabDevicePackage.getScriptDynamicBusDevice()
